捓字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yé］
［《集韻》余遮切，平麻，以。］
见“捓揄”。

捓字的康熙字典解释

【卯集中】【手字部】　捓； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页434第07
【集韻】余遮切。同擨。捓揄，舉手相弄也。【白居易詩】時遭人指點，數被鬼捓揄。亦作擨?。又或作歋歈。【說文】作歋?。【後漢書】作邪。別作揶。互詳揄擨二字註。　又【集韻】羊諸切，音余。胥捓，殘餘也。

捓字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
捓字的起名意思

暂无。

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Collection] [Hands and Words Department] 　捓; Kangxi strokes: 11; Page number: page 434 to 07
[Ji Yun] Yu Zhe cut. The same. Flick, raise your hand and do it too. [Bai Juyi's Poems] She was sometimes pointed out by others, and stupefied by ghosts. Also for 擨?. Or as a 歋歈. [Said the text] work?. [Books of the Later Han Dynasty] Do evil. Don't tease. The two-character note of teasing each other in detail.　[Jiyun] Sheep all cuts, sound surplus. Xu Ba, the remnants are also.
